description:
The tempest reboot stress test leaves some vms in ERROR state with the following in the log for each instance:

2012-04-02 15:59:56 DEBUG nova.network.linux_net [req-200eac86-5608-4bc1-b994-7ddb201ab670 e5edfa94dbbc4cdc88ca50b31c4ee66b de85bc3\
386ff4c409198228d302624f7] IPTablesManager.apply completed with success from (pid=1333) apply /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova\
/network/linux_net.py:335
2012-04-02 15:59:57 WARNING nova.virt.libvirt.connection [req-200eac86-5608-4bc1-b994-7ddb201ab670 e5edfa94dbbc4cdc88ca50b31c4ee66b\
 de85bc3386ff4c409198228d302624f7] [instance: d7223b60-62b5-4ef9-b6ee-111ee99cc24d] Error from libvirt during unfilter. Code=55 Err\
or=Requested operation is not valid: nwfilter is in use
2012-04-02 15:59:57 ERROR nova.compute.manager [req-200eac86-5608-4bc1-b994-7ddb201ab670 e5edfa94dbbc4cdc88ca50b31c4ee66b de85bc338\
6ff4c409198228d302624f7] Failed to terminate instance: Error unfiltering instance.. Setting instance vm_state to ERROR

Running Essex RC2
title: Create/reboot stress test causes libvirt failure

comments.content:
The tempest reboot stress test leaves some vms in ERROR state with the following in the log for each instance:

2012-04-02 15:59:56 DEBUG nova.network.linux_net [req-200eac86-5608-4bc1-b994-7ddb201ab670 e5edfa94dbbc4cdc88ca50b31c4ee66b de85bc3\
386ff4c409198228d302624f7] IPTablesManager.apply completed with success from (pid=1333) apply /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova\
/network/linux_net.py:335
2012-04-02 15:59:57 WARNING nova.virt.libvirt.connection [req-200eac86-5608-4bc1-b994-7ddb201ab670 e5edfa94dbbc4cdc88ca50b31c4ee66b\
 de85bc3386ff4c409198228d302624f7] [instance: d7223b60-62b5-4ef9-b6ee-111ee99cc24d] Error from libvirt during unfilter. Code=55 Err\
or=Requested operation is not valid: nwfilter is in use
2012-04-02 15:59:57 ERROR nova.compute.manager [req-200eac86-5608-4bc1-b994-7ddb201ab670 e5edfa94dbbc4cdc88ca50b31c4ee66b de85bc338\
6ff4c409198228d302624f7] Failed to terminate instance: Error unfiltering instance.. Setting instance vm_state to ERROR

Running Essex RC2
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~david-kranz

comments.content: This still happens in the Essex final release.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~david-kranz

comments.content: David - sorry for how long it's taken to get to this. Could you confirm whether it's still happening in Folsom? Thanks
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~markmc

comments.content:
I tried this today and do not see this error. However, I do see a bunch of other errors. Most of them happen multiple times but I have filtered them down to one each. I am also attaching the whole log.

comments.content:
Other bad things happened as well. After the test finished and tried to kill the vms, one was left over and cannot be killed. 'nova list' shows one vm but doing a 'virsh list' on the host of that vm shows three vms running. Trying to delete the vm with 'nova delete' does nothing but shows the following in the log (look for ERROR). I believe there are a lot of timing/race condition sorts of bugs that would be flushed out by some one with real nova knowledge running this test. I would be happy to help.

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~david-kranz

comments.content: @David: ideally you would file specific reports for each class of error, if you can still reproduce them. That should make it more easy to make progress rather than having them all on a single report.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: This bug lacks the necessary information to effectively reproduce and fix it, therefore it has been closed. Feel free to reopen the bug by providing the requested information and set the bug status back to ''New''.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v
